item.title: My Journey Building a Scalable, Cached Embedding Server with TEI and Qdrant
item.description:
My Journey Building a Scalable, Cached Embedding Server with TEI and Qdrant

Github repo: https://github.com/joe32140/tei-qdrant-cache

Before We Start

Serving machine learning models efficiently, especially powerful embedding models, often requires more than just loading a checkpoint. As models grow and use cases demand high throughput or handle repetitive queries, challenges around scaling, latency, and resource utilization emerge. My goal was to create a robust system for serving text embeddings using Hugging Face’s text-embeddings-inference (TEI) server, specifically targeting multi-GPU setups and incorporating a mechanism to handle repeated requests efficiently â€“ essentially, building a smart caching layer.
